trends: There have been no other sightings in Atherton
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting Detailslying in a hammock on a summer saturday looked at clear blue afternoon skybetween non moving branches of oak tree, noticed a starplanet on a clear day Itwas chrome like reflective, didnt move. I asked my son to bring binoculars andnoticed it appeared ovalspherical. I could not make out any windows but couldeasily see no bottom attachments, rotars, wings etc, which would be manmade.TheSFO flight pattern is around my house and they turn at 12 to 1 mile in the airto land. A jet flew by crossing its wing across the object giving someperspective as I believe it was perhaps2 or 3 miles from me. As I watched withbinoculars, the bottom seperated slowly and decended a hundred feet or so.Itbottom 13, slowly moved east and appeared more discal shaped. The originalbody remained motionless for a few more minutes until it slowly moved west.After a while I lost sight of them both.Just wondering if others had seen thisat about the same time. As near as I could tell, it must have been situated overthe south san fran. bay.-Clayton Heatley
